title: Alternatives to the Ti/Ti2 pad in NIS Elements
description: The Ti2 pad can take up a lot of screen are in NIS-Elements and users generally only use it to select the objective and turn on the perfect focus system. Here we show an alternative that provides more useful information to the user and takes up less screen space.

title: NIS-Elements Layouts
description: NIS-Elements is a comprehensive acqusition and analysis software and as such can have a lot of buttons. However, this needn't be the case. Below are simplified layouts for different microscopes.

title: Welcome to microscopy-threads
description: Welcome to our blog, microscopy-threads. The intention is to build a repository for advances in light microscopy, as well as some acquisition and analysis routines for NIS-Elements that Nikon microscope users may find helpful.
